version_description: Correct bug with camera not activating during first use of the QR code scanning

New features to help you manage your wash pass:
- Track your pass balance, activity and usage
- Get notifications when your pass is about to expire
- Receive BONUS offers
- Choose between Touchless or Soft Cloth every time you use the app
-

New in v2.1
- Manage your carwash pass conveniently from your phone
- Track your pass balance, activity and usage
- Get notifications when your pass is about to expire
- Receive BONUS offers
- Choose Touchless or Soft Cloth wash every time<

- Manage your carwash pass conveniently from your phone
- Track your pass balance, activity and usage
- Get notifications when your pass is about to expire
- Receive BONUS offers

New in v2.1.3
- this update is recommended for all users
- fixed bug reported when double touch on Start Wash button instead of single touch
- made changes to reduce applications impact on iPhone resources
- improve look of some screens on sma

Bug fixes:
- username was incorrectly set to be case sensitive
- this update is recommended for all users

- Improved the user experience at the keypad by properly displaying the Start Wash button
- Users can now send a Start Wash request even if they are not using cell data

- corrected issues responsible for a small number of crashes
- corrected link to directions when pressing the pin on the map. Guidance is now correct.

- addition of "Off Peak" washing periods from 6pm to 11am every day. Get a free wash for every 5 uses of your Flexpass 5, 10 or 20 pass during these off-peak periods !
- more detailed history of activity with details of bonuses received and when they a

Support for new iPhoneX screen with changes to some visual elements
Support for IOS 11 location service request changes from IOS 10. This could potentially prevent a user from starting the wash using bluetooth 4.0+
Minor bug fixes and corrections

Minor change to customer prompts in the Wash tab
Improvements to start the wash more reliably.

- minor bug fixes and enhancements
- new messaging for invalid cards when entered through the profile tab

- New secure login using Google and Facebook authentication in addition to standard email address as username
- New loyalty system to record one time use codes and earn loyalty towards a free wash
- New in-store promotion viewing, allows the user to

- minor bug fix related to how Loyalty codes are managed
- added Sign in with Apple to login options
